p:
Mrs. Mary
Arlington being duly sworn on oath doth depose and say That she is the petitioner and applicant for a writ of habeas corpus named in the foregoing petition that she has heard and read said petition, and that the statements therein contained are true to the best of her knowledge and belief
Sworn to before me, and subscribed in my presence by the said Mary Arlington this 26th day of January AD 1885
Petition of Mrs. Mary Arlington For cc Habeas Corpus
